name: Verify Neuros CLI Input Behavior and HELP Command
description: Validates that the Neuros CLI accepts input, converts to uppercase, and the HELP command displays database entries.
testObjective: Ensure Neuros CLI input mechanics and HELP command function correctly.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Neuros terminal CLI is open and displays 'NEUROS ONLINE'

steps.action: Type lowercase letters (e.g., 'test') in the Neuros CLI
steps.expected: All typed letters are automatically converted to uppercase (displays as 'TEST')
System displays list of available database entries: Galactic Fruit, Fabrica, Ladagocia, Mesdoion
System displays description of Galactic Fruit

steps.action: Type each database entry name ('Fabrica', 'Ladagocia', 'Mesdoion') one at a time
steps.expected: Each entry displays its corresponding description when queried
Neuros terminal CLI closes and returns to normal view
